title: Okx stop orders
body:
This PR

- enables cancelling a stop order via `cancelOrder` by passing `{"stop": true}` through params
- removes the requirement of extra parameters like `ordType` and `algoId` for stop orders
- cleans up okx order methods code
- contains 2 commits from https://github.com/ccxt/ccxt/pull/13438 that edit safeString2 in js and php

--------------


2022-05-26T05:39:37.329Z
Node.js: v14.17.0
Python v3.10.4
CCXT v1.84.5

## createOrder

```
% okx createOrder ADA/USDT limit buy 10 0.45                  % okx createOrder ADA/USDT market sell 10 0.45 '{"stopPrice": 0.45}'                                   
okx.createOrder (ADA/USDT, limit, buy, 10, 0.45)              okx.createOrder (ADA/USDT, market, sell, 10, 0.45, [object Object])
2022-05-26T05:37:01.141Z iteration 0 passed in 292 ms         2022-05-26T05:50:58.744Z iteration 0 passed in 307 ms
                                                              
{                                                             {
  info: {                                                       info: { algoId: '449932464266682368', sCode: '0', sMsg: '' },
    clOrdId: 'e847386590ce4dBC5557efacb41dbb49',                id: '449932464266682368',
    ordId: '449928951119638533',                                clientOrderId: undefined,
    sCode: '0',                                                 timestamp: undefined,
    sMsg: '',                                                   datetime: undefined,
    tag: ''                                                     lastTradeTimestamp: undefined,
  },                                                            symbol: 'ADA/USDT',
  id: '449928951119638533',                                     type: 'market',
  clientOrderId: 'e847386590ce4dBC5557efacb41dbb49',            timeInForce: undefined,
  timestamp: undefined,                                         postOnly: undefined,
  datetime: undefined,                                          side: 'sell',
  lastTradeTimestamp: undefined,                                price: undefined,
  symbol: 'ADA/USDT',                                           stopPrice: undefined,
  type: 'limit',                                                average: undefined,
  timeInForce: undefined,                                       cost: undefined,
  postOnly: undefined,                                          amount: undefined,
  side: 'buy',                                                  filled: undefined,
  price: undefined,                                             remaining: undefined,
  stopPrice: undefined,                                         status: undefined,
  average: undefined,                                           fee: undefined,
  cost: undefined,                                              trades: [],
  amount: undefined,                                            fees: []
  filled: undefined,                                          }
  remaining: undefined,
  status: undefined,
  fee: undefined,
  trades: [],
  fees: []
}
```

## cancelOrder

```
% okx cancelOrder undefined ADA/USDT '{"clientOrderId": "e847386590ce4dBC69e063867476b333"}'    % python3 examples/py/cli.py okx cancelOrder 449928951119638533 ADA/USDT       % python3 examples/py/cli.py okx cancelOrder 449934952503971840 ADA/USDT '{"stop": true}'                    % okx cancelOrder undefined ADA/USDT '{"stop": true, "algoId": "449935638788579328"}'
okx.cancelOrder (, ADA/USDT, [object Object])                                                   okx.cancelOrder(449928951119638533,ADA/USDT)                                   okx.cancelOrder(449934952503971840,ADA/USDT,{'stop': True})                                                  okx.cancelOrder (, ADA/USDT, [object Object])
```

## cancelOrders

```
% okx cancelOrders '["449931355173056514"]' ADA/USDT
okx.cancelOrders (449931355173056514, ADA/USDT)
2022-05-26T05:47:14.370Z iteration 0 passed in 289 ms
```

```
1 objects
```

repo.name: ccxt
repo.description: A JavaScript / Python / PHP cryptocurrency trading API with support for more than 120 bitcoin/altcoin exchanges

repo.name: ccxt
repo.description: A cryptocurrency trading API with more than 100 exchanges in JavaScript / TypeScript / Python / C# / PHP / Go
